channel.title: dots on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in dots on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Dots
item.description: dots 10 November 1998 Cool! I powered up my old PC: 486 33MhZ with 8 megs of ram, and was looking for a cool old file when I came across some of my old programs. One is Dots, which I wrote in "The Spring of 1990" (as it says in the help menu) and I'm sure it was written in Pascal. "Dots?" To play, draw a grid of dots and each player takes turns drawing lines between adjacent dots either vertically or horizontally.
